detail_desc: Blouse in a printed weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, short sleeves with a decorative tab and button, and a rounded hem.

Sleeveless blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck with ties at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking and gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.

Sleeveless blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck with ties at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking and gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a yoke that has gathered seams front and back. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a yoke that has gathered seams front and back. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, loose-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, trumpet sleeves, a ribbed neckline and straight hem.
